EngLawName: Fee-charging Standards for Professional Certification of Records Manager
name: 檔案管理人員專業認證考試收費標準
histories: According to the mandate at Tang-Chi No.1120012446B issued by NAA the standards was made and announced on December 27, 2023；shall come into force from the date of promulgation.

articles.content: The standards are prescribed by paragraph 1 of the Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
Each examination participant must pay a registration fee of NT$500.
The registration fee of Article 2 shall be reviewed at least once every three years considering the fluctuation of expenses, costs, consumer price index, and other factors.
The standards shall come into force from the date of promulgation.
